column2: "text": "Bicycle stolen from locked shed overnight. No previous incidents reported."
"text": "Group of teenagers seen drinking and shouting in the park. Dispersed on arrival of officers."
"text": "Single report of graffiti on garage door. No suspects identified."
"text": "Resident reports a one-off noise disturbance from nearby construction work. No further issues."
"text": "Caller reports a broken window in a communal hallway. No witnesses or previous complaints."
"text": "Parking dispute between two drivers
"text": "Report of fireworks being set off in a local park by teenagers. Area clear on arrival."
"text": "Lost mobile phone reported at shopping centre. No suspicious activity."
"text": "Single complaint about loud television from next-door neighbour. No previous calls."
"text": "Dog found running loose in street. Owner located shortly after."
"text": "Neighbours report loud arguing between a couple. Police attended
"text": "Caller reports ongoing harassment from neighbour
column3: including repeated banging on walls and shouting late at night."

column2: "text": "Shop employee reports a customer returning several times to argue about a refund."
"text": "Caller reports ongoing conflict with neighbour over shared driveway access."
"text": "Woman reports ex-friend sending passive-aggressive messages and showing up at social events uninvited."
"text": "Neighbours report repeated shouting late at night from the same apartment. No injuries
"text": "Resident reports strong smell of cannabis from neighbour’s flat and regular visitors late at night."
"text": "Father reports escalating arguments with teenage son
"text": "Staff member reports a colleague raising their voice aggressively during a disagreement."
"text": "Victim states her ex-partner has been waiting outside her workplace for several days and sending threatening messages."
"text": "Victim reports ex-partner breached restraining order
column3: entered property and threatened to kill her in front of the children."

column2: "text": "Victim reports ex-partner has tried to contact her over 50 times this week despite block and previous warnings."
"text": "Caller states neighbour threatened to 'come back with a knife' after an argument over parking."
"text": "Woman reports partner smashed her phone during argument
"text": "Victim reports being followed from work by unknown male for three consecutive days."
"text": "Caller states ex-partner breached restraining order again and attempted to enter property."
"text": "Man reports receiving explicit death threats online related to ongoing harassment case."
